suites.title: Website registration and login
suites.description:
Website for for clothes. Customers must be able to login and register without problems

```
```

cases.title: Login with Facebook acount.
cases.description: User must be able to login with Facebook acount.
cases.postconditions:
Logged in User is located in : https://teodor.bg/customer/account/

```
```

steps.expected_result: Facebook registration is avalivable with button.
The windows with data appear.

steps.action: Enter valid Email and valid password
steps.expected_result: User is able to enter with Facebook profile.

cases.title: Login with Google acount.
cases.description: User must be able to enter in website with Google acount,
cases.postconditions: Logged in User is located in : https://teodor.bg/customer/account/

steps.expected_result: Google acount registration is avalivable with button.

steps.action: Click on Enter with Google acount.
steps.expected_result: The windows with data apear.

steps.action: Enter valid gmail and valid password.
steps.expected_result: User is able to enter with Google gmail profile.

cases.title: Registration.
cases.description: User must be able to register in website without problem.

steps.expected_result: Registration is avalivable with button.
The empy text blank apear.

steps.data: Name: Emanoel Last Name: Petrov Email: emanoel.k.petrov@gmail.com password: xxxxxx.

steps.action: Click on any field with this mark \*.

steps.expected_result: The windows with picture with task apear.

steps.action: Finish the picture game rightly with using clicks on the indicated squares.
steps.expected_result: The picture is closing with green mark.
Registration is compleated, and receiving a Email from www.tedor.bg

cases.title: Registration with  existing Email.
cases.description: User must not be able to register with existing Email.

steps.expected_result: Registration is avalivable with button.
The empy  text blank appear.

steps.data: Name: Emanoel Last Name: Petrov Email: emanoel.k.petrov@gmail.com password: xxxxxx.

steps.action: Click on any field with this mark ‘‘\*’’

steps.expected_result: The windows with picture with task appear.

steps.action: Finish the picture game rightly with using clicks on the indicated squares.
steps.expected_result: The picture is closing with green mark.
Registration is not compleated.Receiving system message;An account already exists.

cases.title: Registration  without marking the required fields.
cases.description: User must not be able to register in website without mark all field with this mark. ‘‘\*’’

steps.expected_result: Registration is avalivable with button.
The empy text blank appear.

steps.data: Name: Emanoel Last Name: Petrov Email: emanoel.k.petrov@gmail.com password: xxxxxx.

steps.expected_result: The windows with picture with task apear.

steps.action:
Finish the picture game rightly with using clicks on the indicated squares.

```
```
steps.expected_result: The picture is closing with green mark.
Registration is not copleated.All fields with this \* mark is are explained with red color.

cases.title: Login with existing profile.
cases.description: User must be able to login without problems.

steps.expected_result: Login is avalivable with empty text fields.
‘‘My profile page’’ is open. User is sucesfull login.

cases.title: Login with not existing profile.
cases.description: User must be not  able to enter in website with not existing profile .

steps.expected_result: Login is avalivable with empty text fields.

Receiving System message : 
Account login is incorrect or your account has been temporarily disabled. Please wait and try again later.

cases.title: Login with wrong password.
cases.description: User must  not be able to login .

steps.expected_result: Login is avalivable with empty fields.

Receiving message:
’’Account login is incorrect or your account has been temporarily disabled. Please wait and try again later.’’

cases.title: Forgoten password
cases.description: User must be able to change his password and receiving instruction or Email to change it.

steps.expected_result: Forgoten password button is avalivable..
Empty field with email and im not robot appear.

steps.action: Enter valid data(Email) and click im not robot.

steps.expected_result:
Receiving system massage:
If you have an account associated with emanoel.k.petrov@gmail.com you will receive a link to reset your password.
System send Email to: emanoel.k.petrov@gmail.com

cases.title: Enter with old password after receiving message for creating new.
cases.description: User must be able to enter with his old password.

steps.expected_result: Login is avalivable with empty fields.
User is login sucesfull and my profile page is open.

cases.title: Change password.
cases.description: User must be able to change password.
cases.preconditions:
1\.Open Gmail.com

2\.User must be login with  Email

steps.expected_result: List with inbox message is apear.
The leter open sucesfull.

steps.action: Click on set a new password.
steps.expected_result: www.teodor.bg is open and the empty fields text appear for  new password.

steps.data: New password: xxxxxx Confirm password: xxxxxx

steps.expected_result: Password   change sucesfull, receiving system message: You have updated your password.
